dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.
dependencies.name: cmake

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
LAMMPS stands for Large-scale Atomic/Molecular Massively Parallel
Simulator.
dependent_to.name: lammps

description:
MolSSI Driver Interface (MDI) Library The MolSSI Driver Interface (MDI)
project provides a standardized API for fast, on-the-fly communication
between computational chemistry codes. This greatly simplifies the
process of implementing methods that require the cooperation of multiple
software packages and enables developers to write a single
implementation that works across many different codes.
name: py-mdi

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
